search.query: | datamodel | spath modelName | search modelName="CAR*" | spath "objects{}.fields{}.displayName" |spath "objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.fieldName" | rename modelName AS CAR_Object | rename "objects{}.calculations{}.outputFields{}.fieldName" AS action | rename "objects{}.fields{}.displayName" AS fields | table CAR_Object, action, fields
